message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $750,000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive price. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $750,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save as much as possible, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $725,000. This is a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.
